entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 5:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then southeast 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Freezing rain inland early in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
